message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer.  $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it right now. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget, but $150 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $120?
Alice, $120 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $100. If you're willing to accept that, I'll buy it right now. Let me know.
